"I've heard the Bulmegara scale has
cosmetic, fatigue recovery, and health
effects."

"I'm not a medicine specialist,
but shouldn't I want to keep
adopting good ingredients?"

"Oh, I just keep getting
more and more ideas!"

"どうもありがとう！
今からとっても楽しみね。"

"ブルメガーラのうろこには、美容効果の
